contest-event.event-date:
May 20, 2012 D Weston-super-Mare (Fourth Section)
Weston-super-Mare (Fourth Section) 40 Own Choice Test Piece Contest Weston-super-Mare Contest weston-super-mare-fourth-section
Winter Gardens, Weston-super-Mare, Somerset, England, UK Best Soloist, Solo Cornet, Bratton Silver Prizes - 1st £100, 2nd £75, 3rd £50. 8 bands competed.
Feb. 22, 2012, 12:34 p.m. July 7, 2020, 2:23 p.m.
1 Severn Tunnel Band Joshua Ruck Music from Kantara
2 Bratton Silver Band Simon Carr The Haslemere Suite
3 South Molton Town Band Gilbert Taylor English Folk Song Suite
4 Launceston Town Band David Dobson Lydian Pictures
5 Abertillery & District Youth Dean Evans Dimensions
6 Ebbw Valley Brass Gareth Ritter Dimensions
7 Malvern Hills District Brass Band Christopher Small The Rollright Stones
8 Wellington Silver Gordon Francis Little Suite for Brass [Arnold]
